name: QrDecodeInfo
summary: Diagnostics returned by QR decoding attempts.

properties.name: Version
properties.summary: Gets the decoded QR version (1..40) when available.

properties.name: ErrorCorrectionLevel
properties.summary: Gets the error correction level when available.

properties.name: Mask
properties.summary: Gets the mask pattern index when available.

properties.name: FormatBestDistance
properties.summary: Gets the best distance to a format pattern (lower is better).

properties.name: IsSuccess
properties.summary: Gets a value indicating whether decoding succeeded.

properties.name: Message
properties.summary: Gets a human-friendly message describing the failure.
